column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I thought the food was fine but nothing fantastic. My heart and stomach are not called back to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba. We had shrimp
column4: and the spicy potatoes (probably the most memorable dish out of them all). Portion sizes were reasonable for the price
column5: and the two of us were pretty stuffed with 4 dishes. Not a bad experience by any means but I would say this place is quite average. Not really much to write home about.
